vc.prottype: FWLIBAPI short WINAPI cnc_seqsrch(unsigned short FlibHndl, long seq_no);

cmn.p: Searches the specified sequence number of the selected program in CNC.
CNC mode is changed to "STOP" mode after searching.(except FS30i, FS0i-D/F, PMi-A)

content.p: Specify the library handle. See "Library handle" for details.

item.name: EW_DATA
item.content:
Data error
The specified sequence number does not exist.

item.name: EW_NOOPT
item.content:
No option
The extended driver/library function is necessary.

item.name: EW_MODE
item.content:
CNC mode error
See the section of CNC mode.

item.name: EW_REJECT
item.content:
CNC execution denied
30i/31i/32i, 0i-D/F, PMi-A CNC is in the emergency stop.

option.hssb: The extended driver/library function is necessary.

ethr.p: The Ethernet function and the extended driver/library function are necessary.
However, in case of Series 16i/18i/21i-B, 0i-B/C/D/F, Series 30i and PMi-A, the required CNC option is as follows.

p.ul: above two optional functions are not required.

cmn.ul:
Series 15 It is possible to use in MEM, TAPE mode.
Series 15i It is possible to use in MEM, DNC mode.
Series 30i, 0i-D/F, PMi-A It is possible to use in MEM, RMT mode.
Series 16/18/21, 16i/18i/21i, 0i-A/B/C, Power Mate i It is possible to use in MEM mode.

is_mode.cmn: It is possible to use in MEM, RMT mode.
